mapper.select: SELECT * FROM category_code_info t WHERE t.categoryTypeId = #{categoryTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM category_code_info_helipay t WHERE t.categoryTypeId = #{categoryTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT i.* FROM category_code_info i WHERE i.categoryTypeId = ( SELECT c.categoryTypeId FROM category_code_info c WHERE c.categoryId = #{categoryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
